00030     class Category;

00032     class CategoryStream {
00033         public:
00034         CategoryStream(Category& category, int priority) :
00035             _category(category),
00036             _priority(priority) {
00037         }
00038         
00039         ~CategoryStream() { };
00040         
00041         inline Category& getCategory() const { return _category; };
00042         inline int getPriority() const { return _priority; };
00043         
00044         private:
00045         Category& _category;
00046         int _priority;    
00047 
00048         public:
00049         template<class T> CategoryStream& operator<<(/*CategoryStream& stream,*/ 
00050                                                      const T& t) {
00051         if (getPriority() != Priority::NOTSET) {
00052             ostrstream buffer;
00053             buffer << t << '\0';
00054             getCategory().log(getPriority(), 
00055                               string(buffer.str()));
00056         }
00057         return *this;
00058         };
00059     };
